April 8, 1912 D Redhill Contest (First Section)
Redhill Contest (First Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
redhill-contest-first-section
None
Test Piece Contest
L'Africaine
Wiggie Lane Gardens, Redhill, Surrey 1st prize £7.10s. and cup, 2nd prize £5.10s., 3rd prize £4, 4th prize £3. March contest 1st (£1) Chichester City, 2nd (15s.) Reigate Town, 3rd (10s.) West Crawley Temperance. Best soloist award divided between Cornet and Euphonium of West Crawley Temperance. 5 bands competed.
April 28, 2012, 8:31 a.m. Sept. 27, 2018, 12:01 p.m.
1 West Crawley A. Williams
2 Chichester City Band Fred Mortimer
3 Sutton Red Cross H. H. Harding
4 Copthorne Silver Band W. Coverley
5 Reigate Town George Byford
